page.title: 16A DAY IN MY LIFE by ROBBIE
page.content: I get up at half past eight and get dressed and have tea and toast for {breakfast.}Then I get a lift in the school car if it is a wet day. When we go in we have a prayer, briefly do our News and then do our Mathematics until half past ten. I may do my kniting until it is time for break which starts at eleven o'clock. We go in at quarter past eleven and do Spelling and maybe Cliffhangers until our meal arrives from{Lochinver. We have our lunch which today is potatoes,stew,turnip and jelly and cream for pudding. We then have another longer break in which we play {Cops and Robbers}or{Tig.}We go in at half past one. We usually do something in our study book until half three when I go home.I usually go out to play and then have tea. I will then watch T.V until bedtime at 9p.m.
